name: Banana Nut Muffins
description: A Banana nut muffin !!  Not a lot of description required here ! TFA Banana Nut Bread was the perfect choice here for that banana nut part of the mufffin and the FLV Cupcake Batter just helps add a little depth and helps the bread flavor ! Mix this one up people, leave your feedback, and rate it , Thanks !!!!!! SK..
author: SamKayla
